title: So why is lux Q/E really hard to see?
body:
Seriously guys, shouldn't be rocket science, don't use color's of the map, keep animations the same.

I struggle to see Lux's new skin's E/Q and it's kinda ridiculous that this comes up so often.

replies.body:
Out of curiosity, do you have f.lux or the red in your monitor turned up?

I haven't played against or with the skin yet so I haven't seen for myself, but Omega Squad Veigar was the same. I have the red turned up quite a bit though so that's probably why for me (they're usually on top of those sort of clarity issues), I just wonder if it's the same for you given her particles are also orange-y reddish.

f.lux?

As for the red in my montior, i'll make a note to check it after the next game, and while i did have a similar issue with Omega Squad Veigar, they did actually change the color to be slightly more visible (still not the greatest in a teamfight, but not much you can do about that) and i'm hoping they will do the same with this even if it is my monitor.

That said, if it is the red in my monitor, you'd think they would pick it up in testing.

f.lux is just a program that turns the red up at night so your monitor is less retina burning, but I just have mine turned up all the time. I tend to have mine turned up more than most people seem to which can of course wash out some red effects so I was just wondering if it was a contributing factor.

It probably would be picked up in testing, but I doubt they'd change an effect just for the few people that turn their red way up. If you're not aware of it that's probably not the issue though.

Just checked, and no real abnormal settings from when i got it.

And they really should just change things if things aren't easily visible, especially for a champion like Lux.
This is true, I'm a big fan of clarity as much as I'm a fan of pretty visuals. Can't say how I feel about it till I play it though. Watching it doesn't have the same effect.
Yeah i played against a lux support earlier, and struggled to actually dodge her abilities because i had to really strain my eyes to see it properly.
